original_text: You may bring them to the Lord as an offering of the firstfruits, but they are not to be offered on the altar as a pleasing aroma.
korean_text: 처음 익은 것으로는 그것을 여호와께 드릴지나 향기로운 냄새를 위하여는 제단에 올리지 말지며

sentences.original_text: You may bring them to the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 그것들을 주께 가져올 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: as an offering of the firstfruits
but they are not to be offered on the altar
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그것들은 제단에 드려져서는 안 됩니다
